ComicInfo.Summary: Farris Jorn is an ex-soldier who fought in the Afghanistan war. He's suffering from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and in order to help him, Dr. Lingenfelter put him under hypnosis. However, the truth behind his nightmares was horrific. Jorn has some kind of "Viking" ancestry, and when he got captured with a friend, his enemies tortured him to the point awaken a bloody berserker rage. He not only got rid of his enemies but in his blood lust, decapitated his fellow friend too.
